mainText:
I never got the chance to meet Steve Jobs but watched him on tv and he was a
 brilliant man and changed the way everyone looked at smartphones and laptops & iPods an iPads that changed the way people live everyday and he will be deeply missed for his creativity my deepest sorrows go out to the Steve Jobs family and Apple family there will never be another like mr. Steve Jobs may he rest in peace with all the other great creators.
author: Anonymous
